Posts.Content: monicasfriend wrote: Hi All: I am trying to compile some uplifting survivor stories for my friend Monica who has had a recurrence of her BC after 3 1/2 years.  I am sure I am missing parts of her particular medical situation but here goes....She was diagnosed with DC 3 1/2 years ago and had a masectomy followed by chemo and radiation.  She has tested "clean" since then.  Last week it was discovered that she has cancer again, this time in some lymph nodes (not sure how many, but I think 3). One is in her neck, not sure where the other ones are.  She is starting chemo tomorrow.  Have any of you been down this same "road" with positive results?  If so, what was your treatment?  I would love to give her a pile of emails from some of you that can show her that many, many women have been in her same shoes and have come out the other end a survivor.  We (her friends and family) are confident that she will be OK but it would mean so much more hearing it from someone who has been there.  Please email me with any uplifting stories I can pass her way.  Thank you all so much in advance!!  Colleen Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I need positive survivor stories for my friend! Please help! monicasfriend LuAnnH
